text: Andrea Gadaldi (August 25, 1907 - January 16, 1993) was an Italian professional football player and coach. He played for 10 seasons (271 games, 4 goals) in the Serie A for Brescia Calcio and A.S. Roma. ==External links== Category:1907 births Category:1993 deaths Category:Italian footballers Category:Serie A players Category:Serie B players Category:Brescia Calcio players Category:A.S. title: Andrea Gadaldi
